cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to 'invalid' (valid options: none, info, debug, etc.) will cause logging configuration failure and prevent proper log initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting absoluteFrequencySSB to 0 (must be positive frequency) will cause frequency configuration validation failure and prevent SSB transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 absoluteFrequencySSB 設定為 0（必須為正頻率）會導致頻率配置驗證失敗，並阻止 SSB 傳輸。
